code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getExpenses,getIncomes}from'../services/api';import AddExpense from'./AddExpense';import AddIncome from'./AddIncome';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);const[incomes,setIncomes]=useState([]);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const fetchedExpenses=await getExpenses(token);const fetchedIncomes=await getIncomes(token);setExpenses(fetchedExpenses);setIncomes(fetchedIncomes);};fetchData();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl",children:"Add Expense"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddExpense,{token:token})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl",children:"Add Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddIncome,{token:token})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl",children:"Expenses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:expenses.map(expense=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"".concat(expense.category,": ").concat(expense.amount)},expense._id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl",children:"Incomes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:incomes.map(income=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"".concat(income.source,": ").concat(income.amount)},income._id))})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
